channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2023090028
item.description:
Report X-2023090028

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-14
  • City: DARTMOUTH
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING, WAS TRANSPORTED TO THE DMP UPON INSPECTION BY RESPONDER. A LIMITED QUANTITY LABEL WAS DISCOVERED ON INTERIOR PACKAGING SIX BOTTLES WERE FOUND. PROCESSING UNDECLARED HAZMAT.

item.title: Report X-2023090025
item.description:
Report X-2023090025

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-18T15:13:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-08
  • City: LYNNFIELD
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS UNLOADED AND SENT TO THE SOUTH SORT. THE SORTER NOTICE THE PACKAGE NEEDE TO BE TAPED CLOSED. HE ALSO NOTICED THE PACKAGE CONTAINED BULLETS WITH NO OUTER MARKINGS INDICATING IT WAS A HAZMAT. HE NOTIFIED HIS SUPERVISOR. THE SUPERVISOR THEN BROUGHT IT TO THE DMP AREA FOR FURTHER INSPECTION. IT WAS DETERMINED TO BE UNDECLARED SHIPMENT.

item.title: Report X-2023081138
item.description:
Report X-2023081138

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-11
  • City: NORTH BILLERICA
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package probably dropped during either the unloading or loading process and placed in a hazmat bag within a hazmat bin. DescribePack: The bottom of the glass jug has approximately has a 4 inch hole in it. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: spill pads and paper towels were applied to the spill area immediately.

item.title: Report X-2023080455
item.description:
Report X-2023080455

  • City: SHREWSBURY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO UNLOAD FOR A LEAKING CORRISVE HAZMAT PACKAGE. UPON INSPECTION RESPONDER DISCOVERED INSIDE WAS A 1 GALLON BOTTLE WITH NO PACKING MATERIAL INBETWEEN BOTTLE AND OUTER PACKAGING. RESPONDER PROCESSED LEAKER THROUGH DMP.
